best game!!!

but to many waller,,,

This fps has a high skill floor for an fps and then an even higher skill cap meaning it is a game you can stick hour and hours into in order to improve. Unlike most fps games the player will be able to look back at different intervals of play time and see how far they have come.  

Just dont play without prime matchmaking.

It is simply the optimal FPS game in the world.
- balanced tech requirements for what is delivered
- game mechanics that enables a very competitive edge
- the stronger FPS community worldwide

No wonder it is the state of the art of the genre for more than two decades.
